tool_description: This API's goal is to help any investor or dev that is creating a new finance app securely save, track and retrieve their transactions, portfolios and more. In order to separate subscribers data we require certain headers (see terms of use or the header parameters on the test section) to be added on each request.
name: IVAS - Transactions
title: IVAS - Transactions

api_list.name: Get Many
api_list.description: This endpoint allows users to fetch all their saved Transactions.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description:
The Id of the user from YOUR system.

Default is 1.

api_list.name: Get Summary
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a summary of the portfolio of the provided User.
